amendment.description: To ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited from buying a firearm are listed in the national instant criminal background check system and require a background check for every firearm sale.

action.text: SA 4750 fell when the the motion to table the motion to commit the bill to the Senate Committee on the Judiciary with instructions to report back forthwith with the following amendment (SA 4750) agreed to.

Amendment SA 4750 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murphy. To ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited from buying a firearm are listed in the national instant criminal background check system and require a background check for every firearm sale.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4750 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murphy.
